bbc00157-6717-45cc-8cce-25601382aa51.description: Earners of this badge have 10 years of membership with ISCA and are recognised as a qualified accountancy and finance professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
bbc00157-6717-45cc-8cce-25601382aa51.name: ISCA 10 Years Membership Milestone Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum bachelor degree
Must be an ISCA member for at least 10 years
Must maintain ISCA membership in good standing and comply with the CPE requirements with no outstanding complaints or disciplinary proceedings

76de0794-eae2-44cd-9d93-828aee27ae2e.description: Earners of this badge have 20 years of membership with ISCA and are recognised as a qualified accountancy and finance professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
76de0794-eae2-44cd-9d93-828aee27ae2e.name: ISCA 20 Years Membership Milestone Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum bachelor degree
Must be an ISCA member for at least 20 years
Must maintain ISCA membership in good standing and comply with the CPE requirements with no outstanding complaints or disciplinary proceedings

473a2550-2130-42a7-b541-860ac50b76a1.description: Earners of this badge have 30 years of membership with ISCA and are recognised as a qualified accountancy and finance professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
473a2550-2130-42a7-b541-860ac50b76a1.name: ISCA 30 Years Membership Milestone Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum bachelor degree
Must be an ISCA member for at least 30 years
Must maintain ISCA membership in good standing and comply with the CPE requirements with no outstanding complaints or disciplinary proceedings

753b3921-d510-4a51-aa7b-0a01fc4fd952.description: Earners of this badge are recognised as competent and experienced professional accountants in business and finance. They were admitted to ISCA membership as graduates of recognised accounting degrees or qualifications. They have also fulfilled at least 3 years of work experience in accounting or finance roles, such as auditing and assurance, finance, financial accounting, financial risk management, financial planning, insolvency, taxation, management accounting and academia.
753b3921-d510-4a51-aa7b-0a01fc4fd952.name: ISCA Professional Business Accountant

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Recognised bachelor degree or accounting qualification
Must fulfill the Associate (ISCA) admission requirements
Must maintain ISCA membership in good standing and comply with the CPE requirements with no outstanding complaints or disciplinary proceedings
Must acquire at least three (3) years of post-qualification relevant work experience.
Must be an existing Associate (ISCA) who qualified for the Grandfathering Scheme (i.e. Experience Route) or have completed the ISCA PBA Programme.

f6ca55a4-f7a3-4ae2-bac7-a72f03ba39c5.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with the essential skills and knowledge of a qualified financial forensic professional, including forensic accounting and investigation, digital forensics methodology and techniques, financial crime and investigation and professional requirements.
f6ca55a4-f7a3-4ae2-bac7-a72f03ba39c5.name: ISCA FFAQ Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification within the Candidature Validity Period

676c71f8-c12c-45d9-a553-cad1737b5774.description: The badge holders who have completed the ISCA PBA programme is equipped with emerging skill sets and knowledge to handle dynamic business situations with enhanced competencies such as understand the use of technology to enhance efficiency in business processes; Proficient in the knowledge & application of accounting & other professional standards; Business savvy to effectively take on a business partnering role; Act professionally and ethically; and leadership qualities.
676c71f8-c12c-45d9-a553-cad1737b5774.name: ISCA Professional Business Accountant (PBA) Programme

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: The PBA Programme is a six-month programme designed for the accountancy professionals to enhance their competencies with reference to the ISCA Professional Accountants in Business (PAIB) Framework such as 1) Future Finance 2) Technical Excellence 3) Business Acumen 4) Professional Values & Ethics and 5) Leadership and Personal Empowerment. Administered through e-learning platform, this Programme allows professional accountants to build skill sets with ease and flexibility.

An ISCA Professional Certificate in Business Accounting will be awarded to participants who have completed:  i. The objective-based assessment of all the modules; and ii. The overall objective-based assessment in the ISCA PBA Programme. Participants need to complete each module and achieve at least 75% correct answers to pass every assessment

56f53b19-9257-41b3-97aa-eb85964e8519.description: Earners of this badge have 40 years of membership with ISCA and are recognised as a qualified accountancy and finance professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
56f53b19-9257-41b3-97aa-eb85964e8519.name: ISCA 40 Years Membership Milestone Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Minimum bachelor degree
Must be an ISCA member for at least 40 years
Must maintain ISCA membership in good standing and comply with the CPE requirements with no outstanding complaints or disciplinary proceedings

cac2ab7a-8e3b-4d9e-8c21-af5484a6541a.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with practical knowledge of the roles and responsibilities of forensic accountants, in identifying and explaining the different types of white-collar crimes, and in conducting investigations and preparing of reports for different stakeholders.
cac2ab7a-8e3b-4d9e-8c21-af5484a6541a.name: ISCA FFAQ_FoAI Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Forensic Accounting and Investigation Module workshops under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification
Pass the Forensic Accounting and Investigation Module under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification

e2b85709-de79-4daf-af34-d647285f44b6.description: Earners of this badge are capable of performing basic data analytics functions using technological tools to derive useful insights to facilitate data-driven decision making and analysis.
e2b85709-de79-4daf-af34-d647285f44b6.name: ISCA-SUSS BA Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Fulfilled the requirements for ISCA-SUSS Certificate in Business Analytics

fc74ef0a-aa09-4817-8ea4-b309d04a3ce7.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with practical knowledge of the key aspects of the financial industry, the types of financial crimes, including money laundering, terrorism financing and sanctions, the applicable laws and regulations and financial institutions investigation approaches.
fc74ef0a-aa09-4817-8ea4-b309d04a3ce7.name: ISCA FFAQ_FC Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Financial Crime Module workshops under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification
Pass the Financial Crime Module under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification

3a92789d-8c95-4380-b5d0-36c9ec57882b.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with practical knowledge of digital forensics methodology skills and essential techniques to recover, authenticate and preserve electronic data as a form of legal evidence.
3a92789d-8c95-4380-b5d0-36c9ec57882b.name: ISCA FFAQ_DF Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Digital Forensics Module workshops under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification
Pass the Digital Forensics Module under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification

e44b47c6-7d5a-4d06-9422-e82769a907c0.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with practical knowledge in the mandatory professional requirements, including the implications of non-compliance with the code of professional conduct and ethics, anti-money laundering and countering the financing of terrorism regulations.
e44b47c6-7d5a-4d06-9422-e82769a907c0.name: ISCA FFAQ_PR Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Professional Requirements Module under ISCA Financial Forensic Accounting Qualification

79060df6-6df7-4e85-bac5-cc6991bce45e.description: Earners of this badge are recognised as a qualified and experienced financial forensic professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
79060df6-6df7-4e85-bac5-cc6991bce45e.name: ISCA FFP Credential Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successful application for ISCA Financial Forensic Professional Credential
Must be an ISCA member and satisfy relevant membership and experience requirements

564fc5cd-0f97-4437-b8d1-a179047d8455.description: The badge holders have completed one of the RPA course (A) - Robotic Process Automation (RPA) for Accountants and Finance Professionals; OR (B)The Robotic Process Automation (RPA) for Auditors, are equipped with the skills to identify types of audit, accounting and finance processes suitable for RPA implementation, develop simple RPA script and implement automation on their work processes using RPA software.
564fc5cd-0f97-4437-b8d1-a179047d8455.name: Robotics Process Automation (RPA)

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: The Robotic Process Automation (RPA) for Accountants and Finance Professionals is a 10-hour course aims to equip participants with the skills to easily create simple and useful RPA scripts to identify such processes and implement automation on accounting and finance processes. At the end of the course, participants will be able to automate their own manual and repetitive processes, freeing up time for more value added tasks.

The Robotic Process Automation (RPA) for Auditors is a 14-hour course aims to equip participants with the skills to easily create useful RPA scripts to automate the audit, accounting, tax and corporate secretarial processes, without any coding or programming knowledge. Participants will learn how to achieve this through using a RPA software.  At the end of the course, participants will be able to immediately use the RPA solutions and adopt the use of RPA in their workplace.

The course includes an assignment which requires application of RPA script for audit process(es). Participant should bring along forms or templates currently used by the firm to the clinic for the purpose of completing the in-class assignment.

skills.name: RPA For Accounting And Finance Tasks

77037603-679a-4d2d-ad84-45d30ae6bd78.description: Earners of this badge are the representatives and leaders among the Youth Associates (ISCA) and the advocates of professionalism, commitment and enthusiasm for aspiring accountants.
77037603-679a-4d2d-ad84-45d30ae6bd78.name: ISCA Youth Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Must have served while being a Full-time Accountancy student
Must have served while being a Youth Associate (ISCA) member
Must have contributed and participated in Youth Ambassador duties for at least one academic year
Must have strong peer network and are highly motivated, proactive and actively engaged in university life and academic course.
Must be outgoing and well-spoken and have strong public speaking, communications and interpersonal skills with enthusiasm and passion for the accountancy profession

58888e33-a453-4b4c-8b6b-39b8ef8fecaf.description: Earner who have completed BAR programme and obtained the certificate of competency would have passed a project-based assessment. He is capable of designing an appropriate database to support various reporting requirements. He is also skilled in Advanced Excel functions and able to build sustainable and interactive models for reporting, decision making, conceptualise scenarios and create value-adding reports through use of visual and graphical skills.
58888e33-a453-4b4c-8b6b-39b8ef8fecaf.name: Business Analytics and Reporting (BAR)

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earner who have attended the BAR programme, submitted the BAR project and  met all assessment requirements. He has shown capability in designing an appropriate database to support various reporting requirements. He is also skilled in Advanced Excel functions and able to build sustainable and interactive models for reporting, decision making, conceptualise scenarios and create value-adding reports through use of visual and graphical skills.
Earners have attended the 3-day course, submitted the BAR project and met all assessment requirements.

skills.name: Skilled In Business Analytics Using Excel

c8746ed3-39ea-44ff-98e1-39c653dd0280.description: Earners of this badge are capable of performing a range of data analytics functions using technological tools to derive useful insights to facilitate data-driven decision making and analysis.
c8746ed3-39ea-44ff-98e1-39c653dd0280.name: ISCA-SUSS BA Specialist Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Fulfilled the requirements for ISCA-SUSS Specialist Certificate in Business Analytics

421419f6-f4b2-4cc4-85a4-f0cd7e210b74.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with understanding of the key audit concepts and requirements (audit planning process, risk assessment; ethical/professional requirements and responsibilities of audit engagement team members); the skills in managing audit process (applying relevant audit concepts including audit evidence, audit sampling and audit documentation), and ability to address audit exceptions using the ISCA Audit Manual for Standalone Entities (ASME).
421419f6-f4b2-4cc4-85a4-f0cd7e210b74.name: Practical Audit Workshop - Audit Working Paper 2

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed the intermediate level of the course and showed understanding of the key audit concepts & requirements (audit planning process, risk assessment; ethical/professional requirements & responsibilities of audit engagement team members); the skills in managing audit process (applying relevant audit concepts including audit evidence, audit sampling & audit documentation), and have the ability to address audit exceptions using the ISCA Audit Manual for Standalone Entities (ASME).
Earners have completed the assessment which was conducted during mid and end of workshop.

0e2b97f7-7205-453d-987c-6e5047798671.description: Earners of this badge are conversant in the relevant audit concepts and are capable in improving the overall audit efficiency and effectiveness, identifying the role and responsibilities of the audit engagement team; risk assessment and appropriate responses; evaluation of audit exceptions and alternative audit procedures; review of audit work paper; evaluation of the sufficiency and appropriateness of audit evidence; supervision of audit staff; quality control process over audit engagement.
0e2b97f7-7205-453d-987c-6e5047798671.name: Practical Audit Workshop - Supervisory and Review (PAW - SAR)

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed the Advanced level of the course and are conversant in the audit concepts & capable in improving the audit efficiency & effectiveness, identifying the role/responsibilities of the audit engagement team; risk assessment & appropriate responses; evaluation of audit exceptions & alternative audit procedures; review of audit work paper; evaluation of the sufficiency & appropriateness of audit evidence; supervision of audit staff; quality control process over audit engagement.
Earners have completed the assessment which was conducted during mid and end of workshop.

3e879e13-84ec-458b-b8b1-9e6fa6ca77dc.description: Earner is equipped with foundation knowledge of the audit procedure and capability of applying the relevant audit procedure, the documentation requirements and also be exposed to common audit exceptions.
3e879e13-84ec-458b-b8b1-9e6fa6ca77dc.name: Practical Audit Workshop - Audit Working Paper 1

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed the foundational level of the course and have a clear and consistent understanding of the audit work performed and able to address any audit exceptions.
Earners have completed the assessment which was conducted during mid and end of workshop.

cfe552b1-3b4a-44b0-8ca9-db99521eca87.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with knowledge of a PPP contract and the key commercial principles involved, the basic concept of Value for Money (VfM) and application knowledge of the financial modelling of PPP projects.
cfe552b1-3b4a-44b0-8ca9-db99521eca87.name: ISCA IPFQ_CM Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Contracts and Modelling Module workshops under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification
Pass the Contracts and Modelling Module under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification

919bc233-0726-4218-a1d7-6495ee15ecf0.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with knowledge of risk analysis and its application as part of project development and implementation, as well as the nature and characteristics of project finance, the various sources and key financing terms.
919bc233-0726-4218-a1d7-6495ee15ecf0.name: ISCA IPFQ_PRF Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Project Risks and Financing Module workshops under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification
Pass the Project Risks and Financing Module under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification

78eac8ea-09fc-40ab-9fbe-654b8f4b4b2a.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with the essential skills and knowledge of a qualified infrastructure and project finance professional, including project development and procurement processes, project risks and financing, contracts and financial modelling.
78eac8ea-09fc-40ab-9fbe-654b8f4b4b2a.name: ISCA IPFQ Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification within the Candidature Validity Period

7d65b7fe-55db-4b21-8f6b-029b8c818e00.description: Earners of this badge are equipped with practical knowledge of the required factors to be considered as part of project development as well as the different stages involved in procurement processes.
7d65b7fe-55db-4b21-8f6b-029b8c818e00.name: ISCA IPFQ_PL Module Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Project Lifecycle Module workshops under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification
Pass the Project Lifecycle Module under ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Qualification

2e85ba7c-10c2-4655-a90f-78f0fb98e068.description: Earners of this badge are recognised as a qualified and experienced infrastructure and project finance professional with the essential skills and knowledge valued by employers. Earners are also recognised as holding the highest standards in ethical and professional conduct.
2e85ba7c-10c2-4655-a90f-78f0fb98e068.name: ISCA IPFP Credential Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successful application for ISCA Infrastructure & Project Finance Professional Credential
Must be an ISCA member and satisfy relevant membership and experience requirements

70f9824f-3d6f-4c96-87fc-db729b946328.description: Badge holders who have completed the 6-month Accountancy Future Leaders Programme (AFLP) are equipped with practice management leadership capabilities to lead successful changes in the firm(s). Through a series of e-learning, project work with coaching, leadership talks and facilitated workshops that focus on Business, People and Technology Strategies, the participants are geared up with leadership capabilities, market insights and business growth tactics.
70f9824f-3d6f-4c96-87fc-db729b946328.name: Accountancy Future Leaders Programme (AFLP)

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Developed by ISCA in partnership with the Singapore Accountancy Commission (SAC), the AFLP provides a structured and formalised professional development pathway aimed at developing selected individuals of accounting firms, in particular the Small and Medium Practices (SMPs), in leadership capabilities which is essential for succession planning. It also aims to improve the competitiveness of SMPs and to enhance the quality of their services.
Completion of all e-learning modules, workshops, talks and project work.

070f4596-6b77-42c5-8860-1b8f07eb48bf.description: Earner who have completed and pass the assessment components in Advanced Business Analytics and Reporting are equipped with the ability to use advanced Excel functions and charting techniques, to create and communicate Excel financial reports. They have shown a high level of financial analysis and business reporting skills and can be an expert in building sustainable, interactive and impressive reporting models with Excel.
070f4596-6b77-42c5-8860-1b8f07eb48bf.name: Advanced Business Analytics and Reporting (BAR+)

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earner have attended the 2 day course and passed both online assessment and project assignment in Advanced Business Analytics and Reporting and show the ability to use advanced Excel functions and charting techniques, to create and communicate Excel financial reports. They have a high level of financial analysis and business reporting skills and can be an expert in building sustainable, interactive and impressive reporting models with Excel.
Meet the attendance requirement, completion of e-learning, fulfillment of assessment  and project requirements

16612863-06ef-42a8-b277-e279acd6740d.description: Earner are competent in identifying and addressing the different types of risks effectively and efficiently in the current unpredictable environment by creating greater flexibility and accuracy in specifying the organisation’s risk reduction needs. They are also equipped with the necessary skills to assess various financial risks and manage them strategically with the use of latest financial instruments.
16612863-06ef-42a8-b277-e279acd6740d.name: ISCA Professional Risk Management Programme

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed pre-course reading modules, 4-day course & passed 2 online assessments and have show competency in identifying & addressing the different types of risks effectively & efficiently by creating greater flexibility and accuracy in specifying the organisation’s risk reduction needs. They are also equipped with the necessary skills to assess various financial risks & manage them strategically with the use of latest financial instruments.
Earner who have completed pre-course reading modules, attended the 4-day course and passed 2 online assessments during the course.

skills.name: Enterprise Risk Management / Financial Risk Management

350ebc0d-52cf-4af5-a179-7a804e7c1f83.description: Earner are conversant in the relevant audit concepts and are capable in improving the overall audit efficiency and effectiveness, identifying the role and responsibilities of the audit engagement team; risk assessment and appropriate responses; evaluation of audit exceptions and alternative audit procedures; review of audit work paper; evaluation of the sufficiency and appropriateness of audit evidence; supervision of audit staff; quality control process over audit engagement.
350ebc0d-52cf-4af5-a179-7a804e7c1f83.name: Practical Accounting Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Earners are equipped with knowledge on key fundamental requirements of the Singapore Financial Reporting Standards (“FRS”); financial reporting framework (Singapore context); overall principles in applying FRSs in practice; and application of ‘single set of documents’. They are capable in preparing the financial statements presentation on assets and impairments of assets, obligations (liabilities), financial instruments and investment interests.
Earners have met the attendance and assessment requirements.

skills.name: Financial Reporting Standards (FRS) / Financial Reporting Framework / Financial Reporting Professional Accountant
